sn1.20:5.1: * “Abhutvā bhikkhasi bhikkhu,
sn1.20:7.1: Atha kho sā devatā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā āyasmantaṃ samiddhiṃ etadavoca:
sn1.20:7.2: “daharo tvaṃ, bhikkhu, pabbajito susu kāḷakeso, bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato, paṭhamena vayasā, anikkīḷitāvī kāmesu.
sn1.20:8.1: “Na khvāhaṃ, āvuso, sandiṭṭhikaṃ hitvā kālikaṃ anudhāvāmi.
sn1.20:8.2: Kālikañca khvāhaṃ, āvuso, hitvā sandiṭṭhikaṃ anudhāvāmi.
sn1.20:8.3: Kālikā hi, āvuso, kāmā vuttā bhagavatā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā;
sn1.20:8.5: Sandiṭṭhiko ayaṃ dhammo akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī”ti.
sn1.20:9.1: “Kathañca, bhikkhu, kālikā kāmā vuttā bhagavatā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo?
sn1.20:9.2: Kathaṃ sandiṭṭhiko ayaṃ dhammo akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī”ti?
sn1.20:10.1: “Ahaṃ kho, āvuso, navo acirapabbajito adhunāgato imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ.
sn1.20:10.2: Na tāhaṃ sakkomi vitthārena ācikkhituṃ.
sn1.20:10.3: Ayaṃ so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho rājagahe viharati tapodārāme.
sn1.20:10.5: Yathā te bhagavā byākaroti tathā naṃ dhāreyyāsī”ti.
sn1.20:11.1: “Na kho, bhikkhu, sukaro so bhagavā amhehi upasaṅkamituṃ, aññāhi mahesakkhāhi devatāhi parivuto.
sn1.20:11.2: Sace kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, taṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ puccheyyāsi, mayampi āgaccheyyāma dhammassavanāyā”ti.
